trans-unit.source: Azure Machine Learning Studio provides many different state-of-the art machine learning algorithms to help you build analytical models.
trans-unit.target: Azure Machine Learning Studio provides many different state-of-the art machine learning algorithms to help you build analytical models.

trans-unit.source: First, identify the general type of machine learning task you are performing, as the algorithms grouped in each category are tailored to specific predictive tasks.
trans-unit.target: First, identify the general type of machine learning task you are performing, as the algorithms grouped in each category are tailored to specific predictive tasks.

trans-unit.source: If you need help selecting an algorithm, see these resources:
trans-unit.target: If you need help selecting an algorithm, see these resources:

trans-unit.source: Machine learning algorithm cheat sheet for Microsoft Azure Machine Learning Studio
trans-unit.target: Machine learning algorithm cheat sheet for Microsoft Azure Machine Learning Studio

trans-unit.source: How to choose Azure Machine Learning algorithms for clustering, classification, or regression
trans-unit.target: How to choose Azure Machine Learning algorithms for clustering, classification, or regression

trans-unit.source: After you have chosen an algorithm and configured its parameters, you can then use one of the <legacyLink xlink:href="0c67013c-bfbc-428b-87f3-f552d8dd41f6" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">training modules</legacyLink> to run data through the chosen algorithms, or you can use <link xlink:href="038d91b6-c2f2-42a1-9215-1f2c20ed1b40" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Sweep Parameters</link> to iterate over all possible parameters and determine the optimal configuration for your task and data.
trans-unit.target: After you have chosen an algorithm and configured its parameters, you can then use one of the <legacyLink xlink:href="0c67013c-bfbc-428b-87f3-f552d8dd41f6" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">training modules</legacyLink> to run data through the chosen algorithms, or you can use <link xlink:href="038d91b6-c2f2-42a1-9215-1f2c20ed1b40" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Sweep Parameters</link> to iterate over all possible parameters and determine the optimal configuration for your task and data.

trans-unit.source: Having built and trained a model, typically your next step is to use one of the <link xlink:href="be8a69b7-d1e3-4fa2-a174-7abe0bcce4e9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Score</link> modules to generate predictions based on the model.
trans-unit.target: Having built and trained a model, typically your next step is to use one of the <link xlink:href="be8a69b7-d1e3-4fa2-a174-7abe0bcce4e9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Score</link> modules to generate predictions based on the model.

trans-unit.source: You can use the modules in the <link xlink:href="ea496474-d04c-474f-896f-3f4531cd8be0" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Evaluate</link> section to measure the accuracy of the model, based on the scores you’ve generated.
trans-unit.target: You can use the modules in the <link xlink:href="ea496474-d04c-474f-896f-3f4531cd8be0" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Evaluate</link> section to measure the accuracy of the model, based on the scores you’ve generated.

trans-unit.source: Azure Machine Learning Studio provides the following broad kinds of machine learning algorithms, grouped by typical machine learning scenarios.
trans-unit.target: Azure Machine Learning Studio provides the following broad kinds of machine learning algorithms, grouped by typical machine learning scenarios.
